ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Account_Status__c , 'approved'), OR( ISBLANK( TEXT( Legal_Entity__c ) ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Theater__c ) ), ISBLANK( Compliance_Designations__c ), ISBLANK( BillingStreet ), ISBLANK( BillingCity ) , ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( BillingState ) , ISBLANK( ShippingStreet ), ISBLANK( ShippingCity ) , ISBLANK( ShippingState ) , ISBLANK( Uses_MSA_of__c ) ) )
